K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-008:412b-14: ji ltar grong khyer chen por chud pa'i mching bu'i nor bu bzhin du /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-008:412b-15: 'dus ma byas thob pa'i nyan thos dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-008:412b-16: rang sangs rgyas dmigs pa can thams cad du blta'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-008:412b-18: ji ltar nor bu rin po che chen po'i bee d'urya rgya mtsho chen po'i nang na yod pa grur bcug pa bde zhing nye zho med par tshong khang gi bar du 'ongs par gyur pa /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-008:413a-3: dpyid zla tha chung gi zla ba las chen po lo tog gis rab tu gang ba la grog sbur phra mos zas kyi 'bru gcig khyer pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-008:413a-4: sa chen po 'di de dag gis gang ba gnyis gang mang bar sems /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-008:413a-7: lo tog gis gang ba'i sa chen po de dpag tu ma mchis pa'i 'bru'i phung po chen po 'byung bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-008:413a-8: des sems can grangs ma mchis dpag tu ma mchis pa rnams tshim par 'gyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-008:413a-10: grog sbur phra mos 'tshal ba'i zas kyi 'bras bus lta ci zhig bgyi ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-008:413a-11: des sems can gang yang 'tsho bar mi 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-008:413a-12: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-008:413a-20: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi gnas pa'i tshul gyis kun rdzob dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-008:413a-21: don dam pa'i bden pa la gnas pas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-008:413a-22: pha rol tu phyin pa drug la sogs pa sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad dang /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-008:413b-1: ye shes kyi tshogs kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i lo tog tu blta'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-008:413b-2: de yongs su smin par gyur nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-008:413b-4: bla na med pa rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i ye shes kyi bde ba mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sems can thams cad kyi 'tsho bar 'gyur ro //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-008:413b-10: bcom ldan 'das kyis mi 'chad pa'i tshul gyis ji ltar bshad pa de de bzhin no //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-008:413b-13: bla na ma mchis pa mi dmigs pa'i ye shes kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dad pas spyod pa'i se la mi spyod pa'i tshul gyis spyod pas nyan thos dang /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-008:414a-15: don dam par chos thams cad shin tu ma byung ba'i bka' mchid mi thos pa'i tshul gyis thos so //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-008:418b-2: chos 'dul ba 'di nyid la sems can thams cad 'dul zhing ston to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-008:418b-3: mi 'jog pa'i tshul gyis rab tu 'god do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-008:418b-4: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa stan de la 'dug ste ma langs par 'di 'dra ba'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-008:418b-5: ting nge 'dzin des 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i gtsug tor gyi gseb spyi bo'i gtsug nas sems can thams cad kyi dmigs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-008:418b-6: mi shes pa sel ba zhes bya ba'i 'od zer byung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-008:418b-7: de byung nas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du sangs rgyas kyi zhing rab 'byams thams cad snang bar byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-008:418b-8: 'od zer snang ba des bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sh'akya thub pas chos bshad pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-008:418b-10: don dam pa'i bden pa gnyis la brten pa mi thos pa'i tshul gyis thos so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-008:418b-11: 'di ltar phyogs bcu mtha' yas mu med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-008:419a-0: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir 'od zer gyi snang ba de las lha'i me tog gi char 'bebs @419a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-008:419a-2: lha'i bdug pa'i char 'bebs pa'i sprin byung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-008:419a-3: lha'i spos kyi char 'bebs pa'i sprin byung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-008:419a-4: lha'i phreng ba'i char 'bebs pa'i sprin byung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-008:419a-5: lha'i byug pa'i char 'bebs pa'i sprin byung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-008:419a-6: lha'i phye ma'i char 'bebs pa'i sprin byung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-008:419a-7: lha'i gos kyi char 'bebs pa'i sprin byung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-008:419a-8: lha'i gdugs kyi char 'bebs pa'i sprin byung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-008:419a-9: lha'i rgyal mtshan gyi char 'bebs pa'i sprin byung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-008:419a-10: lha'i ba dan gyi char 'bebs pa'i sprin byung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-008:419a-11: lha'i rnam par rgyal ba'i ba dan gyi char 'bebs pa'i sprin byung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-008:419a-12: lha'i bla bre'i char 'bebs pa'i sprin gyi bar du byung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-008:419a-23: rnam par rgyal ba'i ba dan dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-008:419a-24: bla bre'i char 'bebs pa'i sprin byung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-008:419a-25: rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-008:419a-26: bla na med pa'i bde ba chen po thams cad phun sum tshogs pa'i lha'i me tog dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-008:419a-36: rnam par rgyal ba'i ba dan dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-008:419a-37: bla bre'i char gyi sprin rab tu gtong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-008:419b-0: de nas 'jam @419b dpal gzhon nur gyur pa ting nge 'dzin de las langs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-008:419b-1: langs nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sh'akya thub pa la lan brgya stong du mar mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bskor ba byas nas 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba 'di nas slar song ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-008:419b-2: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-008:419b-4: chos kyi rnam grangs sangs rgyas dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-008:419b-5: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi 'byung gnas 'di zungs shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-008:419b-7: de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-008:419b-9: chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bdag gis bzung ba ni lags na; rgyas par bgyid ni mi nus so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-008:419b-10: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-008:419b-12: don dam par dmigs pa la mngon par zhen pa'i sems can shin tu mang ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-008:419b-13: rdzas la mngon par zhen pa nas dngos po'i bar la mngon par zhen te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-008:419b-14: log par 'dzin pa de las dbye ba shin tu dka'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-008:419b-15: de skad ces gsol pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-008:419b-16: bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-008:419b-18: chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni 'das pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-008:420a-0: da ltar gyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyis byin gyi mi rlob @420a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-008:420a-1: pa'i tshul gyis byin gyis brlabs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-008:420a-6: rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di chung du na nyan par 'gyur ba de dag ci 'dra bar 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-008:420a-7: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-008:420a-9: chos kyi rnam grangs 'di las de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag par bstan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-008:420a-13: mi ston pa'i tshul gyis bstan to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-008:420a-14: bstan pa de'ang bsam gyis mi khyab /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-008:420a-17: de bzhin du gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di las chung du na yi ge 'bru gcig tsam yang mi nyan pa'i tshul gyis mnyan na sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad bsam gyis mi khyab cing dpag tu med par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-008:420a-18: de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-008:420a-20: chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-008:420a-22: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-008:420a-24: de'i phyir chos kyi rnam grangs 'di kun rdzob dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-008:420a-25: don dam pa'i bden pa bstan pa zhes bya bar zungs shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-008:420a-26: bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-008:420b-0: byang chub @420b sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-008:420b-1: nyan thos chen po de dag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-008:420b-2: tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-008:420b-6: lha ma yin dang; dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-008:420b-7: bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-008:420b-9: don dam pa'i bden pa bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so ////
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-008:420b-10: rgya gar gyi mkhan po sh'akya pra bh'a dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-008:420b-12: zhus chen gyi lo ts'a ba bande dharma t'a sh'i la la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus nas gtan la phab pa //
